@magic-themes

magic themes are themes for magic apps. you decide which theme to load by specifying the theme name in config.THEME

// /config.jsexport default {  // ...rest of config,  THEME: 'blue',}

theme load order

themes get loaded from multiple places. last in the list overwrites earlier entries.

// ...default module styles get inserted here/node_modules/@magic/core/src/themes/THEME/index.js/node_modules/@magic-themes/THEME/assets/themes/THEME/index.js

@magic-themes

below is a collection of the available @magic app themes.

  • @magic-themes/docs

    the @magic documentation theme. used in all @magic docs.

    docs / demo
made with a few bits of magic
